constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 164 (Wednesday, September 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LARSEN of Washington:
H.R. 5337.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 1: ``All Legislative power herein
granted shall be vested in a Congress of the United States,
which shall consist of a Senate and House of
Representatives.''
[Page H5092]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: National Social Emotional Learning Clearinghouse Act
